Paragraph.Text: Use of a Conveyor Belt Filter allows you to have more accurate control over the distribution of resources in a conveyor network. This type of filter is used to control the material ejected from hoppers in a conveyor network. You can set a Filter to remove GARBAGE, ORE, ORGANIC, GEMS, COAL, BIOMASS, SMELTABLE, COMBUSTIBLE, CRAFTED ITEMS, CRYSTAL and BARS ONLY.
